name: Olympic First Choice Salted Biscuits
description:
Olympic First Choice Salted Biscuits (80 gm) are a popular snack enjoyed in Bangladesh for their crispy texture and mildly salty flavor. These biscuits are made using basic, wholesome ingredients like wheat flour, vegetable oil, sugar, and salt. They are perfect for a quick snack on their own or when paired with tea or coffee. Ingredients: Wheat Flour, Sugar, Vegetable Oil, Salt. Uses: Olympic First Choice Salted Biscuits are ideal for snacking, especially with beverages like tea or coffee. They can also be enjoyed as a simple on-the-go snack.

name: Fresh Healthy Choice Salted Biscuit
description:
Fresh Healthy Choice Salted Biscuits provide a light, savory snack in an 80 gm pack. These biscuits are lightly salted, making them a great alternative for those who prefer a less sweet snack option. Perfect for pairing with tea or enjoying on their own.

name: Funtastic Nimok Halal Salted Biscuit
description:
The Funtastic Nimok Halal Salted Biscuits, packed in a 200 gm package, offer a savory and crunchy treat. These salted biscuits are perfect for those who prefer a snack that isn't too sweet, and they pair wonderfully with tea or other beverages. Halal-certified and suitable for all snack lovers.

name: BelleAme Saltish Cookies Biscuit
description:
Salty goodness, filled with buttery flavor. BelleAme Saltish is a classic salty cookie that contains the salty and buttery goodness needed to make you constantly crave for more. Turn every afternoon or evening break into a delightfully tasty event, with the nutritional goodness of BelleAme Saltish that goes great with tea, friendly hangouts or even as a snack.
